By continuing to the next step, you confirm your agreement with the
Thanks. Your order has been successfully completed!
You will receive an automatic order confirmation by e-mail. This is an overview of your order. We will keep you informed of the status of the order by e-mail.
You can also check the status of your order under
The order number can be found on the order confirmation that you receive by e-mail.
Your order will expire as follows:
Your order will be processed and the products will be reserved for you if they are in stock. If you want to pick up the products and they are in stock, you will receive a confirmation.
Payment received (2-3 business days for bank transfer)
You will receive a confirmation by e-mail as soon as we receive your payment and the products are ready for shipment.
Have you indicated that you would like to pick up your products?
You can pay in cash or with debit card in our stores.
We ship the products through qualified delivery services. Small packages are sent via PostNL. As soon as these are sent you will receive a Track & Trace number with which you can track your order.
Have you indicated that you would like to pick up your products?
Then you will receive notification from us when the products are ready for you.
In most cases you will receive your order within 3 working days.
You will receive an invoice upon delivery. Keep it well.
You can contact our customer service every day of the week! Want to know more about TV and Audio? Curious about how much
you get? We are happy to help you!
Of course you are welcome in one of our eight stores. View the opening hours, directions and other information about our stores here.

Are you looking for a total solution for your company? Do you want multiple screens in a meeting room? Looking for the perfect sound system for your restaurant? As a business customer, you will receive additional benefits from us!
Contact us via the phone number below or via the Live Chat. Of course you can also send an e-mail to
We are happy to explain what we can do for you and how much benefit you will receive!
We like to make a custom deal!
Do you want a personal deal? Let us know. We arrange the best deal for you. We arrange the best deal for you. Of course included full service within the Netherlands and Belgium.
